trans-unit.target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A1_000_011<tab>Learn about the Second Coil of Bahamut.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A1_100_011<tab>Learn about the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A1_100_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The Second Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>turns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within the Second Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter the Second Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “Another Turn in the Coil.”
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members who have not progressed as far as the party leader may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>In this case, their progress will be updated to be the same as that of the leader.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Please note, however, that parties whose members have progressed further than the party leader cannot resume a foray.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into the Second Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>As the name suggests, the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) is a brutally difficult version of the raid of the same name.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>All members must have completed the quest “Sing Me Another Song.”
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Progress within the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage) is shared with the normal version of the raid.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_073<tab>Please note that there are no enhanced rewards available for the Second Coil of Bahamut (Savage). Clearing the raid, however, will earn you an achievement.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_074<tab>Details such as time limit and required party composition are unchanged from the normal version of the raid. For more information, please refer to the entry requirements for the Second Coil of Bahamut.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A2_000_101<tab>Yes
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A2_000_102<tab>No
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have recently completed the Second Coil of Bahamut, and cannot enter again until progress is reset.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_Q3_000_300<tab>Awaiting entry confirmation from party members.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELFOREST_A3_000_301<tab>Cancel
